text: Bruce Hurley (February 16, 1934 â€“ November 4, 2020) was an American politician. He was in the Tennessee House of Representatives as a Republican from the 9th District from 1971 to 1989. Hurley was born in Hancock County, Tennessee. Hurley died on November 4, 2020 in Kingsport, Tennessee at the age of 86.Bruce Hurley ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Businesspeople from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
